name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence with Power-Up Kit
summary: "Nobunaga's Ambition'' is the definitive historical simulation game about becoming a Sengoku daimyo and aiming to unify the country. The 30th anniversary work "Nobunaga's Ambition: Creation" has achieved the biggest and strongest power-up in the history of the series! Numerous new elements have been added, including a "new corps system" where you take command as a daimyo, a "new battle system" where you take command as a military commander, and "Sengokuden" where you live in a turbulent and turbulent time as a human. Create everything with your hands, from the beginning of the Sengoku period to the climax!
